languages.text: "Ахиллеас — главное звено в длинной цепи людей, которые денно и нощно, рискуя жизнью и душой, трудятся над защитой Человечества от его — и твоих — многочисленных врагов. Избавиться от Скаландра значит ослепнуть на оба глаза и остаться без информации о том, кто готовится ударить тебя в спину".

traits.locale_text: "Ахиллеас — главное звено в длинной цепи людей, которые денно и нощно, рискуя жизнью и душой, трудятся над защитой Человечества от его — и твоих — многочисленных врагов. Избавиться от Скаландра значит ослепнуть на оба глаза и остаться без информации о том, кто готовится ударить тебя в спину".

languages.text: "Achilleas is the critical link in a long chain of people who toil day and night, putting their lives and souls at risk, to protect Humanity from its many enemies — your enemies. To send Scalander away is to blind both your eyes and be left ignorant about those who are seeking to stab you in the back."
languages.original_text: "Ахиллеас — главное звено в длинной цепи людей, которые денно и нощно, рискуя жизнью и душой, трудятся над защитой Человечества от его — и твоих — многочисленных врагов. Избавиться от Скаландра значит ослепнуть на оба глаза и остаться без информации о том, кто готовится ударить тебя в спину".

traits.locale_text: "Achilleas is the critical link in a long chain of people who toil day and night, putting their lives and souls at risk, to protect humanity from its many enemies — your enemies. To send Scalander away is to have both of your eyes blinded and be left without a clue about those who are looking to stab you in the back."

"Achilleas is the critical link in a long chain of people who toil day and night, putting their lives and souls at risk, to protect humanity from its many enemies — your enemies. To send Scalander away is to have both of your eyes blinded and be left without a clue about those who are looking to stab you in the back."

"Achilleas is the critical link in a long chain of people who toil day and night, putting their lives and souls at risk, to protect Humanity from its many enemies — your enemies. To send Scalander away is to blind both your eyes and be left ignorant about those who are seeking to stab you in the back."

"Achilleas is the critical link in a long chain of people who toil day and night, putting their lives and souls at risk, to protect Humanity from its many enemies — your enemies. To send Scalander away is to blind both your eyes and be left ignorant about those who are seeking to stab you in the back."

"Achilleas is the critical link in a long chain of people who toil day and night, putting their lives and souls at risk, to protect Humanity from its many enemies — your enemies. To send Scalander away is to blind both your eyes and be left ignorant about those who are seeking to stab you in the back."

languages.text: “阿吉里亚斯是许多人的关键环节。那些人日夜辛劳，将自己的生命与灵魂置于危险之中，保护人类不受众多敌人的伤害。那些敌人也同样是你的敌人。如果你赶走了斯卡兰德，就相当于自废双目，你将再也看不到那些打算在你背后捅刀子的人。”
languages.original_text: "Achilleas is the critical link in a long chain of people who toil day and night, putting their lives and souls at risk, to protect Humanity from its many enemies — your enemies. To send Scalander away is to blind both your eyes and be left ignorant about those who are seeking to stab you in the back."

traits.locale_text: “阿吉里亚斯是许多人的关键环节。那些人日夜辛劳，将自己的生命与灵魂置于危险之中，保护人类不受众多敌人的伤害。那些敌人也同样是你的敌人。如果你赶走了斯卡兰德，就相当于自废双目，你将再也看不到那些打算在你背后捅刀子的人。”

languages.text: «Achilleas es el eslabón crítico de una cadena de personas que trabajan incansablemente día y noche arriesgando sus vidas y sus almas para proteger a la Humanidad de sus muchos enemigos. Enemigos que también son suyos. Expulsar a Scalander es ignorar y dar la espalda a aquellos que justamente buscan apuñalarle por ella».
languages.original_text: "Achilleas is the critical link in a long chain of people who toil day and night, putting their lives and souls at risk, to protect Humanity from its many enemies — your enemies. To send Scalander away is to blind both your eyes and be left ignorant about those who are seeking to stab you in the back."

traits.locale_text: «Achilleas es el eslabón crítico de una cadena de personas que trabajan incansablemente día y noche arriesgando sus vidas y sus almas para proteger a la Humanidad de sus muchos enemigos. Enemigos que también son suyos. Expulsar a Scalander es ignorar y dar la espalda a aquellos que justamente buscan apuñalarle por ella».

languages.text: 「アキレアスは己の命と魂を危険にさらしながら、昼夜を問わず働くメンバーの要だ。人類を数多くの敵――すなわちお前の敵から守るために動いてる。スカランダーを追い払えば、お前の両目が見えなくなって背中を刺そうって奴が忍び寄るのに気付けなくなるぞ」
languages.original_text: "Achilleas is the critical link in a long chain of people who toil day and night, putting their lives and souls at risk, to protect Humanity from its many enemies — your enemies. To send Scalander away is to blind both your eyes and be left ignorant about those who are seeking to stab you in the back."

traits.locale_text: 「アキレアスは己の命と魂を危険にさらしながら、昼夜を問わず働くメンバーの要だ。人類を数多くの敵――すなわちお前の敵から守るために動いてる。スカランダーを追い払えば、お前の両目が見えなくなって背中を刺そうって奴が忍び寄るのに気付けなくなるぞ」

languages.text: "Achilleas ist das entscheidende Glied in einer langen Kette von Personen, die Tag und Nacht arbeiten und ihr Leben und ihre Seele riskieren, um die Menschheit vor ihren zahlreichen Feinden zu schützen – Euren Feinden. Wenn Ihr Scalander wegschickt, verschließt Ihr beide Augen und erfahrt nichts mehr über jene, die Euch von hinten erstechen wollen."
languages.original_text: "Achilleas is the critical link in a long chain of people who toil day and night, putting their lives and souls at risk, to protect Humanity from its many enemies — your enemies. To send Scalander away is to blind both your eyes and be left ignorant about those who are seeking to stab you in the back."

traits.locale_text: "Achilleas ist das entscheidende Glied in einer langen Kette von Personen, die Tag und Nacht arbeiten und ihr Leben und ihre Seele riskieren, um die Menschheit vor ihren zahlreichen Feinden zu schützen – Euren Feinden. Wenn Ihr Scalander wegschickt, verschließt Ihr beide Augen und erfahrt nichts mehr über jene, die Euch von hinten erstechen wollen."

languages.text: « Achilleas est un maillon essentiel de la longue chaîne de braves qui risquent leur vie et leur âme jour et nuit pour protéger l'humanité de ses ennemis... vos ennemis. Renvoyer Scalander, ce serait laisser le champ libre à tous ceux qui essaient de vous planter un couteau dans le dos. »
languages.original_text: "Achilleas is the critical link in a long chain of people who toil day and night, putting their lives and souls at risk, to protect Humanity from its many enemies — your enemies. To send Scalander away is to blind both your eyes and be left ignorant about those who are seeking to stab you in the back."

traits.locale_text: « Achilleas est un maillon essentiel de la longue chaîne de braves qui risquent leur vie et leur âme jour et nuit pour protéger l'humanité de ses ennemis... vos ennemis. Renvoyer Scalander, ce serait laisser le champ libre à tous ceux qui essaient de vous planter un couteau dans le dos. »

languages.text: "Achilleas, İnsanlığı sayısız düşmanından korumak adına gece gündüz demeden yaşamını ve ruhunu riske atan çok sayıda insan için kritik bir konumdadır. Scalander'ı uzaklaştırmak, her iki gözünü de kör edip seni arkandan bıçaklamayı arzulayanlar hakkında bihaber kalman anlamına gelir."
languages.original_text: "Achilleas is the critical link in a long chain of people who toil day and night, putting their lives and souls at risk, to protect Humanity from its many enemies — your enemies. To send Scalander away is to blind both your eyes and be left ignorant about those who are seeking to stab you in the back."

traits.locale_text: "Achilleas, İnsanlığı sayısız düşmanından korumak adına gece gündüz demeden yaşamını ve ruhunu riske atan çok sayıda insan için kritik bir konumdadır. Scalander'ı uzaklaştırmak, her iki gözünü de kör edip seni arkandan bıçaklamayı arzulayanlar hakkında bihaber kalman anlamına gelir."
